thread.title: Brazil to continue investigating Petrobras beyond top divisions
thread.title_full: Brazil to continue investigating Petrobras beyond top divisions | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Brazil to continue investigating Petrobras beyond top divisions
text:
SAO PAULO, July 2 Brazilian federal prosecutor Carlos Fernando dos Santos Lima said on Thursday that investigations into the executive directors at state-run oil company Petrobras has concluded after the arrest of its former head of the international division.
Lima said in a press conference that other areas of the company were still under investigation. (Reporting by Asher Levine; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama )
